anime.name: anilist
anime.description: Gets [username/@mention]'s anilist profile. If no username is specified, it will get the anilist profile of the sender if they have it linked using >linkaccounts.

anime.name: anime
anime.description: Gets basic information about an anime.

other.name: settings
other.description: Changes privacy settings that allows users to mention you to view your linked accounts

other.name: linkaccounts
other.description: Sends link with information on how to link your accounts with your discord account. If it is already linked, it will send the currently linked profile.

other.name: osu
other.description: Gets [username/@mention]'s osu stats. If no username is specified, it will get the osu profile of the sender if they have it linked using >linkaccounts.

moderation.name: quote
moderation.description: Sends embed with the content of the linked message

moderation.name: snipe
moderation.description: Sends embed with content of the last deleted/edited message in the channel
